medical_history.chief_complaint: Necrotizing pancreatitis due to alcohol abuse
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with a complex pseudocyst and multiloculated fluid collection abutting the gastroesophageal junction, suggesting an acute problem associated with heavy alcohol use.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of heavy alcohol use, hypertension, obesity, and personal history of malignant neoplasm of thyroid.
medical_history.social_history: Heavy alcohol use; history of alcohol withdrawal.
